body_message:
Please see the attached invoice for legal services below  rendered by Go Baluyot & Adion Law Office. For any questions or clarifications, feel free to contact us.

	You may send your cash payment to our address below, or deposit directly to  GCASH or BDO Account. Please send us your proof of payment so we can avoid charging you again. Thankyou we look forward to you compliance.
